alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 9:15AM CST until January 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Portions of west central Kansas and east central and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A narrow band of heavy snow, with 1 to 2 inch per hour snowfall rates, is expected to develop within the warning area with higher snowfall amounts possible. Uncertainty still exists with the exact location of where this band will set up.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
